Trade/Device Name(s): LOCI Vitamin B12 Flex® Reagent Cartridge
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension® EXL™ with LM integrated chemistry system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LOCI Vitamin B12 Flex® Reagent Cartridge and LOCI Anemia Calibrator for quantitative measurement and calibration of Vitamin B12 and Folate in serum and plasma using chemiluminescent immunoassay on the Dimension® EXL™ system.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of Vitamin B12 in human serum and plasma to aid in the diagnosis of vitamin B12 deficiency; calibrator for LOCI FOLA and LOCI VB12 assays on the Dimension® EXL™ system.
